column4: I have a problem with Ubuntu Feisty fawn freshly installed on a pentium 4 system.  I see the startup splash screen and for a split second the busy mouse pointer, but after that there is no display.  Any help is appreciated.  :-)
It should alos be noted that display was visible earlier.
which video card ? no errors ? does it return to console or just crash ?
it doesn't crash. it shows me a blank screen.
the video card is an intel 845GV built in.
i should tell you i enabled "accessible login" in gdm-setup before this happened.
and a different greeter that presents a user list.
really strange ... I don't know what could have happen
can i somehow end the gdm process and restart it in safe mode or something?
because i don't think X is the problem.
the display goes blank after an initial flicker of the mouse pointer.
you can start in safemode ( = single-user mode) directly in console
